name: Cattery Collect
description:
After a trek through the city, Fritz the Cat needs to get home! Guide them through a shortcut by manipulating tiles of the level and unlocking old, forgotten doors. This is a short game.

Made for GDevelop Gam Jam #2

Solo dev

Custom characters and tilesets

Follow me on Twitter @omegagames1 for game updates, devlogs, and game sneak peeks.
